pageContext.claim: “It was all a big hoax. You know that. Disgraceful. We caught the dirty cop on top. Had I not fired Comey, it would have been a whole different story. Would have been a whole different story. That was a great firing.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's firing of Comey led to the appointment of a special counsel -- which resulted in two years of investigations. Trump calls Comey a "dirty cop" but the former FBI director has never been accused of a crime.
